titles.title: To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide grants and training to support area agencies on aging or other community-based organizations to address social isolation among vulnerable older adults and people with disabilities.
Addressing SILO Act of 2021
Addressing SILO Act of 2021
Addressing Social Isolation and Loneliness in Older Adults Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

bill.summary:
Addressing Social Isolation and Loneliness in Older Adults Act of 2021 or the Addressing SILO Act of 2021
This bill provides funding through FY2025 for grants to prevent and address social isolation or loneliness among older adults and individuals with disabilities through education, outreach, and interventions. The Department of Health and Human Services must award these grants to area agencies on aging and community-based organizations.
